Cards

Usage Guidelines

A card is a flexible and extensible content container. It includes options for headers and footers and a wide variety of content. Like many other components, cards are fluid width and should be sized using the grid or a card deck.

Descriptive title

Use the caption to introduce the content below.

Cards with grid

Cards are fluid width and can be organized by putting them inside grid columns, as shown here. If you want your cards to be equal height, use a card deck or ensure that the card content is the same height.

First card

Some pretty neat stuff.

Because cards are fluid-width, any sort of content can be put inside a card. Just keep in mind that fluid images will scale to fit and may get very small, depending on how much space you have allocated for the card.

Second card

This one is different.

Notice how the title is different on this card. Only titles inside .card-header are given a predetermined color and size.

Third card

Not at all like the others.

Card deck

Use the card deck to make a group of cards equal height.

First card

Some pretty neat stuff.

Because cards are fluid-width, any sort of content can be put inside a card. Just keep in mind that fluid images will scale to fit and may get very small, depending on how much space you have allocated for the card.

This one is different.
